author: breser
msg: Need to reset the max line length after calling svn_io_read_length_line().
(read_change): svn_io_read_length_line() changes len to the size read in the
previous call, we need to reset it back to our buffer size before calling

author: ghudson
msg: Fix a pool lifetime bug in FSFS node deletion, triggered by cvs2svn's
habit of deleting children before parents within a dumpfile rev.
ID from dirent before calling svn_fs_fs__dag_delete_if_mutable.
